text:
This is certainly NOT how it is for everyone, just for some people. But if she's given indication she doesn't want anything serious, your best bet (imo) is to walk away before your feelings get even deeper. Maybe later she will see the relationship (or lack of one) differently. Don't invest if she's not on your level.

Just my 2¢.

Edited to add: what you can absolutely learn from this is setting healthy boundaries for yourself and others.
